title: SEC Permits BlackRock, JPMorgan to Offer Dual-Share-Class Funds
description: The US Securities and Exchange Commission is permitting dozens of asset managers including BlackRock, JPMorgan, Fidelity and State Street to offer multi-share class funds.
content: The US Securities and Exchange Commission is permitting dozens of asset managers including BlackRock, JPMorgan, Fidelity and State Street to offer multi-share class funds.
